question: Which examples of carbohydrates exhibit <katex>$\alpha$</katex>-link (<katex>$\alpha$</katex>-glycosidic link) in their structure?
explanation: Amylose and Amylopectin are components of starch.
Starch consists of <katex>$\alpha$</katex>-D-glucose units linked by <katex>$\alpha$</katex>-glycosidic bonds.
